# TX-SELECT Project Summary

This project contains the R scripts for the TX-SELECT paper. It includes scripts for loading required libraries, preparing data, conducting analysis, and generating reproducible plots.

## File Descriptions

- `load_libraries.R`: Script to load all required packages to run other scripts.
- `prep_data.R`: Script to prepare input data using GIS and other datasets.
- `SELECT_counts.R`: Script to prepare input tables for SELECT web tools containing default numbers.
- `analysis.R`: Analysis codes for the TX-SELECT paper.
- `plots.R`: Codes for reproducible plots in the TX-SELECT paper.

## Instructions

To run the code, follow these steps:

1. **Clone Repository**: Clone this GitHub repository to your local machine.

   git clone https://github.com/shubhamjain15/TX-SELECT.git
